creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
After selecting a part of the tree to copy or cut, selecting either Authoring,
Trash, or Archive will cause an exception to be thrown. This is due to the fact
that initParameters is catching null from getSourceDocument. Even after a paste,
this problem persists.

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text:
Created attachment 19714
Checks to see if getSourceDocument returns null

creator: andreas@apache.org
text: I applied the patch. Thanks a lot!
